column5: The 2nd School was off to Stock their Salmon into the Saugeen River at Southampton today & what a beautiful day it was, Grade Jk/Sk & Grade 1/2, Touring the Port Elgin Salmon Hatchery & seeing 30lb stuffed Salmon was definitely one of the high lights & the Stocked Rainbows in the Pond behind the Hatchery     The Saugeen Times Reporter did a great job of covering the Sacred Heart School trip to Stock their Salmon & tour the Hatchery Go down to the Article: EDUCATION Students free school ... of fish  Tight Lines SBK
